name: ElasticBeanstalkOptionSettingsPropertyType
description: OptionSettings is an embedded property of the AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::Environment and AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::ConfigurationTemplate resources. You use the OptionSettings property to specify an array of options for the Elastic Beanstalk environment.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.description: A unique namespace identifying the option's associated AWS resource. For a list of namespaces that you can use, see Configuration Options in the AWS Elastic Beanstalk Developer Guide.

properties.name: OptionName
properties.description: The name of the configuration option. For a list of options that you can use, see Configuration Options in the AWS Elastic Beanstalk Developer Guide.
